resources.string:
1. Bug spray Use a bug spray that uses 20 to 30% DEET

 2. Cover up Wear more clothes to reduce chances of bites and stings

 3. For painful bites/stings Take an over-the-counter painkiller like advil or ibuprofen

 4. For itchy bites Apply an anti-itch cream or topical ointment like hydrocortisone

 5. To reduce swelling Use ice or ice patches to reduce swelling.
Use the slider and toggle button to create custom sounds to be played! Sounds are in units of kHz.
